name: 房间的秘密3：女团回归夜
name_original: 房间的秘密3：女团回归夜
description: Secrets of the Room 3: The Girl Group Back to the Night is the third film of Noface Studio, a puzzle game with a new perspective. The story takes place in the modern background of the overhead N city, the girl group "geometric girl" the latest return single is published soon, as a fan of you, woke up to their idol! Strange things happened one after another: the return to the sound source was stolen by hackers, the # geometric girl collapse # studio also rushed to the hot search. The black material about the girl group members is constantly exposed, you must crack the puzzle as soon as possible, dig out the idol's true heart, find evidence, clarify all kinds of gossip. When you repair the sound source, calm the public opinion, the agent tells you: this is just a carefully planned black and red marketing! More shocking is that the idol's body is actually a bionic man?! She hopes to use your power to expose the company. Seek a clue in different rooms, in the process of understanding idol story deeply, a bigger secret also surfaced subsequently.....
